nodes.text: A Hoopaloo male operated during the High Republic Era. The Hoopaloo worked alongside the former Jedi and monster hunter Ty Yorrick in a job on Alzoc III; however, he betrayed Yorrick during the course of the mission, stealing half of her arsenal of equipment. While Yorrick considered that other mercenaries would hunt down the Hoopaloo and rip his beak from his face, she accepted the loss, not wishing to waste time or effort.
